short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simplest way to take notes quickly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SimplyNote is a simple but elegant and very useful extension to quickly take notes from your browser! It is simple to use and completely free.

Download now!

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us!
